alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 2:24PM EDT until April 27 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN GULF...NORTHEASTERN BAY AND SOUTHWESTERN CALHOUN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA... At 123 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Hiland Park, or 7 miles east of Lynn Haven, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Springfield, Hiland Park, Nixon, Bayhead, Southport, Recota Beach, College Station, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Bennett, Youngstown, Cairo, Brannonville, Vicksburg, Majette and Cedar Grove. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
